alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 1:53PM CDT until August 06 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clayton, or 13 miles northeast of Clio, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Clio, Clayton, Louisville, Blue Springs, Tyler Crossroads, Gaino, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Blue Springs State Park, Osco, Texasville, Richards Crossroads, White Oak, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Millers Ford, Batesville, Clayton Municipal Airport, Lugo, Baker Hill and Mount Andrew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
